title: Ticket #7597: Fix docs for file transfer input/output remaps and directory support
description: The current documentation is out of date, missing some existing features (transfer_input_reamps) and configuration knobs (MAX_REMAP_RECURSIONS), and contains outright lies about remaps not supporting directories. This needs to be rewritten and include some examples with directories since they can be a little tricky.
